books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.details: A novel set in the Jazz Age that explores themes of decadence and excess.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.details: A coming-of-age story about racial injustice in the Deep South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.details: A dystopian novel about totalitarianism and surveillance.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.details: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.details: A story about teenage angst and alienation.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.details: A fantasy novel that follows the adventure of Bilbo Baggins.

books.title: Fahrenheit 451
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.details: A dystopian novel about a future where books are banned.
